name: Archer
description: A swift and agile hunter who excels at striking from a distance. Her arrows rain down on enemies with precision and speed, targeting multiple foes at once.

name: Mage
description: A scholarly master of the arcane arts, wielding volatile lightning magic to devastate groups of enemies. Fragile, but devastating when protected.

name: Healer
description: A serene and wise support unit, channeling calming waters to mend wounds and keep allies on their feet in the heat of battle.

name: Assassin
description: A deadly and elusive killer, dancing through the shadows to eliminate targets behind enemy lines with surgical precision and critical strikes.

name: Druid
description: A guardian of nature, using water-infused rituals to restore vitality to the entire party. Durable for a support, with surprising resilience.

skills.name: Rejuvenation
skills.description: Heal over time for all allies.

name: Pyromancer
description: A volatile spellcaster who thrives on chaos. Her flames engulf enemies over time, creating panic and relentless pressure on enemy lines.

name: Ice Witch
description: Cold and calculated, she bends frost to her will, binding enemies in place with chilling spells that freeze their actions and nerves alike.

name: Warlock
description: A dark scholar who curses from afar, weakening enemies with infernal whispers. Not one for brute strength, but dangerous over time.

name: Bard
description: A musical tactician who empowers allies with magical melodies. Their songs boost morale and speed, turning the tide of battle with rhythm.

skills.name: Battle Hymn
skills.description: Boost SPD for team for 2 turns.

name: Sniper
description: A lone wolf with unshakable aim, trained to spot and eliminate vulnerable targets with deadly accuracy. A single shot can end a fight before it begins.

skills.name: Headshot
skills.description: High crit, chance to instantly KO weak targets.
